attributes.action: Add a box saying "NONE OF THE ABOVE"to voting forms in elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel a box saying "NONE OF THE ABOVE"should be added to voting slips in elections.This is done in countries such as Australia.This,I feel, would bring people who are dissallusioned with politics to the voting arena again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
